program codeforces_313_B
    implicit none
    character(len=100000) :: s
    integer :: q, n, L, R, i
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: cum

    ! Read the string s
    read(*, '(a)', end=10) s    
10  n = len_trim(s)
    ! n is the length of s (number of characters)

    ! Determine extent for cum array (indices 0 to n)
    allocate(cum(0:n))
    cum(0) = 0
    cum(n) = 0

    ! Compute the cumulative array
    do i = 1, n -1
        if (s(i:i) == s(i+1:i+1)) then
            cum(i) = cum(i-1) + 1
        else
            cum(i) = cum(i-1)
        end if
    end do

    ! Now process the queries
    read(*,*) q

    do i = 1, q
        read(*,*) L, R
        write(*,*) cum(R -1) - cum(L -1)
    end do

    deallocate(cum)
    stop
end program codeforces_313_B
